name: One Guy VR
description:
THIS GAME CAN ONLY BE PLAYED WITH A HEADSET!!!

Order, vacuum, and blast away enemies in a game where your surroundings are your ammos, and your hunger is your enemy!

HOW TO PLAY:

Objective: 

Last as long as possible! Try not to get too hungry while playing because it's what they want!

Use your vacuum! :

Your left hand contains a vacuum that can suck up any object on the counter and tables. These items are then stored to be used as ammo for your right arm cannon! Figure out which item does the most damage to each enemy to get the upper hand!

Mayhem for Breakfast!!!! :

It's not a shooter without enemies! And lucky for you, the customer is always right!

At the start of every wave, use the multiple menus that are spawned across the counters to pick and choose the enemies you want to spawn in the upcoming wave. You must order up to the maximum amount that the queue wants for that round in order to start that wave, and the maximum amount increasing the more you progress into the game, so be sure to have a game plan by checking what items are currently surrounding you before you make a final decision!

Move that body... literally! :

Use your surrounds! Point at any of the green pads and press the right grip on your controller to move to that area of the level! Don't forget to duck and dodge when you can to avoid any fries or milkshake cream coming your way!

Controls:

Left Trigger: Turn on/off vacuum

Right Trigger: Shoot out ammo

Right Grip: Teleport to a given green pad
